query: 如图,在DABC中,点D是BC上的一点,已知ÐDAC=30°,ÐDAB=75°,CE平分ÐACB交AB于点E,连接DE,则ÐDEC=()选项：['10°', '15°', '20°', '25°']
answer: 过点E作EM⊥AC于M,EN⊥AD于N,EF⊥BC于H,如图,∵∠DAC=30°∠DAB=75°∴∠EAM=75°∴AE平分∠MAD,∴EM=EN,∵CE平分∠ACB,∴EM=EH,∴EN=EH,∴DE平分∠ADB∴∠1=\frac{1}{2}∠ADB,∵∠1=∠DEC+∠2,而∠2=\frac{1}{2}∠ACB,∴∠1=∠DEC+\frac{1}{2}∠ACB,而∠ADB=∠DAC+∠ACB∴∠DEC=\frac{1}{2}∠DAC=\frac{1}{2}×30^{°}=15^{°}.故选B.
